article.Heading: Budget 2017: Pranab Mukherjee to address joint sitting of two houses today
article.Summary: The Budget session of Parliament was on Saturday convened to start from January 31, a day before the Union Budget is likely to be presented on February1.
article.Body:
President Pranab Mukherjee will address a joint sitting of the two Houses and a pre-budget economic survey will be tabled on Tuesday.

The Budget session of Parliament was on Saturday convened to start from January 31, a day before the Union Budget is likely to be presented on February1.
